promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young simple orca water-type pokemon wearing white and black armor. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or orca. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armorca, a a young simple orca water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Frost Breath, Snowball Fight. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "orca", "water" or "Armorca". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, orca-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This youthful Frost-Breather can often be spotted in winding river habitats, playfully engaging any challengers in a friendly snowball showdown.
